'deactivate' your keyring with an empty password.
but if the password's empty, doesn't mean it'll stop asking for it, right?
yes, and you still can store simple passwords for services.
...which I can't with the edited lightdm?

asking too many questions afer another, yes ->  it'll stop asking for it

only if you want to revert the changes
